title: Looking for plat/high gold duo's
body:
I play alot, so looking for multiple good & consistent duo partners.
got all voice coms, so we can use them.
Just chuck me an add if interested.

replies.body:
Hi there 1800CANIGETAGANK! I work for Quintessential eSports and we're looking for anyone who is diamond or above to apply for our pro team! If you think this is something for you and are looking to take your league up to the next level applications are still open at [www.qtesports.com](http://www.qtesports.com) ! We very much hope you apply! <3
- Thanks QTE team
